title.narrative: Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Human Capital Investment Project

description.narrative: The objective of the Project is to improve availability, utilization, and quality of primary healthcare services and elementary education services in Selected Districts of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa.

participating-org.narrative: Elementary and Secondary Education Department of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa
